name: rustypaste
description: RustyPaste is a self-hosted pastebin service written in Rust. It provides secure paste storage with expiration, attachments, and a minimal web interface.
features: Text pasting: Share code snippets, logs, or text through simple URLs.
File uploads: Upload and share files with automatic expiration.
Syntax highlighting: Display code with proper formatting for multiple languages.
Expiration control: Set automatic deletion times for pastes to manage storage.
CLI support: Upload pastes from the command line for scripting and automation.
API access: Integrate paste functionality into applications using REST endpoints.
Password protection: Secure sensitive pastes with optional passwords.
One-time pastes: Create pastes that delete after being viewed once.
Custom URLs: Choose memorable short codes for your pastes.
Raw view: Access paste content as plain text for downloading or piping.
Minimal interface: Simple web UI focused on functionality over features.
Performance: Handle high traffic efficiently with Rust's speed and safety.
